description: Amp up the festive atmosphere with melted snowman chocolate bark. Loved ones won't be able to resist eating the cute treat.
name: Melted Snowman Chocolate Bark Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place chocolate in a microwavesafe bowl and microwave on medium for 3 minutes, stirring with a metal spoon every minute or until melted and smooth. Set aside for 2 minutes to cool slightly.
Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper. Spoon and spread 2 1/2 tbs of melted chocolate onto 1 prepared tray to form a puddle. Repeat to make 8 in total.
Thinly slice jube, then cut slices into small narrow triangles.

Using the picture as a guide, arrange a peanutbutter-cup piece to form a hat, 2 candy eyes, 1 jube triangle to form a carrot nose, 3 M&Mâ€™s Minis to form buttons, and 2 Pocky stick lengths to form arms on each chocolate puddle. Refrigerate for 30 minutes or until set. Serve.
